project.description: collect daily data about ippReview_SFB and ippCentos7.4-reviewSIM jobs

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
apiAdress=api/json?pretty ProjectName="IPPhone SFB" JobName=ippReview_SFB SUCCESS=SUCCESS FAILURE=FAILURE ABORTED=ABORTED User=benm #ApiToken=0820c5cd2ddda470d58baa1c2847eb37 CountEnteredTheIf=0 arrBranchesIndex=0 countHowManyBuilds=0 length_JobName=ipp_Review_SFB echo -e "
" >> $JobName.txt #run twice (first time on IPPhone SFB and second time on ippCentos7.4-reviewSIM) for j in `seq 0 1` do
#initialize parameters for the second time the job running for ippCentos7.4-reviewSIM if [ "$j" == "1" ] then JobName=ippCentos7.4-reviewSIM arrBranchesIndex=0 countHowManyBuilds=0 length_JobName=reviewSIM echo -e "
" >> $JobName.txt fi set +x #The Main Job Json File (to take all the builds in the jobs) JobJsonFile=$(curl -s --insecure -u $User:$ApiToken "https://jenkins/view/$ProjectName/job/$JobName/$apiAdress")
AllBuildsLength=$(echo "$JobJsonFile" | jq '.builds | length') #check first and last builds number its will check LastBuildNumber=$(echo "$JobJsonFile" | jq '.builds[0].number') FirstBuildNumber=$(echo "$JobJsonFile" | jq '.builds['$(($AllBuildsLength-1))'].number') set -x FirstBuildNumber=$LastBuildNumber #get the last job build number that happend last build LastJobBuildNumber=$(cat $JobName.txt | grep LastBuild: | cut -f2 -d':' | tail -n1) #if its the first time running the job if [ -z "$LastJobBuildNumber" ] then LastJobBuildNumber=0 fi
for i in `seq 0 $(($AllBuildsLength-1))` do set +x #The Main Job Url and the number of the build FatherBuildUrl=$(echo "$JobJsonFile" | jq '.builds['$i'].url') FatherBuildNumber=$(echo "$JobJsonFile" | jq '.builds['$i'].number') set -x #checking if the current build is already in the database if [ "$LastJobBuildNumber" -lt "$FatherBuildNumber" ] then FirstBuildNumber=$FatherBuildNumber
FatherBuildUrl=${FatherBuildUrl:1} FatherBuildUrl=${FatherBuildUrl%'"'}$apiAdress #Get All The Builds of the job set +x AllSonsBuildJsonFile=$(curl -s --insecure -u $User:$ApiToken $FatherBuildUrl)
AllSonBuildsLength=$(echo "$AllSonsBuildJsonFile" | jq '.runs | length') #check if the Father build Failed or succuess FatherBuildFaledOrSuccess=$(echo "$AllSonsBuildJsonFile" | jq '.result')
FatherBuildFaledOrSuccess=${FatherBuildFaledOrSuccess:1} FatherBuildFaledOrSuccess=${FatherBuildFaledOrSuccess%'"'} #Get Gerrit Branch GerritBranch=$(echo "$AllSonsBuildJsonFile" | jq '.actions[5].parameters[2].value')
if [ "$GerritBranch" == "null" ] then GerritBranch=$(echo "$AllSonsBuildJsonFile" | jq '.actions[1].parameters[2].value') fi set -x GerritBranch=${GerritBranch:1} GerritBranch=${GerritBranch%'"'} #Replace '.' and '/' with '_' to save it as a variable GerritBranchNoPoints=$(echo $GerritBranch | tr '.' '_' | tr '/' '_') #check if the length of spesific branch is empty, get the length of this branch childs tempLength="lengthOfChilds_${length_JobName}_${GerritBranchNoPoints}" if [ -z ${!tempLength} ] then declare lengthOfChilds_${length_JobName}_${GerritBranchNoPoints}=0 #check how many Childs this branch have for i in `seq 0 $(($AllSonBuildsLength-1))` do set +x SonBuildsNumber=$(echo "$AllSonsBuildJsonFile" | jq '.runs['$i'].number') set -x if [ "$SonBuildsNumber" == "$FatherBuildNumber" ] then declare lengthOfChilds_${length_JobName}_${GerritBranchNoPoints}=$((lengthOfChilds_${length_JobName}_${GerritBranchNoPoints}+1)) fi done #initialize dynamic variables branchesArr[$arrBranchesIndex]=$GerritBranchNoPoints lengthBranchesArr[$arrBranchesIndex]=${!tempLength} declare AllFailed_$GerritBranchNoPoints=0 declare AllSuccess_$GerritBranchNoPoints=0 declare AllBuilds_$GerritBranchNoPoints=0 declare AllFatherBuildsFaled_$GerritBranchNoPoints=0 arrBranchesIndex=$(($arrBranchesIndex+1)) #declare all the Childs The Parent Have for i in `seq 0 $((${!tempLength}-1))` do declare child_${i}_$GerritBranchNoPoints="" declare CountSonFailed_${i}_$GerritBranchNoPoints=0 declare CountChildSuccess_${i}_$GerritBranchNoPoints=0 done fi #count How Many builds spesific Branch have declare AllBuilds_$GerritBranchNoPoints=$((AllBuilds_$GerritBranchNoPoints+1))
#index for the dynamic childs name indexOfDynamicChilds=0 if [ "$FatherBuildFaledOrSuccess" == "$SUCCESS" ] then #count how many times the father Successeded declare AllSuccess_$GerritBranchNoPoints=$((AllSuccess_$GerritBranchNoPoints+1))
for i in `seq 0 $(($AllSonBuildsLength-1))` do set +x #The Son Build Url and the number of the build SonBuildsUrl=$(echo "$AllSonsBuildJsonFile" | jq '.runs['$i'].url') SonBuildsUrl=${SonBuildsUrl:1} SonBuildsUrl=${SonBuildsUrl%'"'}$apiAdress SonBuildsNumber=$(echo "$AllSonsBuildJsonFile" | jq '.runs['$i'].number') set -x if [ "$SonBuildsNumber" == "$FatherBuildNumber" ] then set +x SonBuildJsonFile=$(curl -s --insecure -u $User:$ApiToken $SonBuildsUrl) set -x #check Childs Names SonBuildUrlName=${SonBuildsUrl##*AUTOPRD=} SonBuildUrlName=${SonBuildUrlName%,*} #get this branch childs name (happen for each branch once) tempChild="child_${indexOfDynamicChilds}_$GerritBranchNoPoints" if [ -z "${!tempChild}" ] then declare child_${indexOfDynamicChilds}_$GerritBranchNoPoints=$SonBuildUrlName fi #count how many times each child was running in total declare CountChildSuccess_${indexOfDynamicChilds}_$GerritBranchNoPoints=$((CountChildSuccess_${indexOfDynamicChilds}_$GerritBranchNoPoints+1)) indexOfDynamicChilds=$((indexOfDynamicChilds+1)) fi done
fi if [ "$FatherBuildFaledOrSuccess" == "$FAILURE" ] then CountEnteredTheIf=0 #count how many times the parent failed declare AllFatherBuildsFaled_$GerritBranchNoPoints=$((AllFatherBuildsFaled_$GerritBranchNoPoints+1)) for i in `seq 0 $(($AllSonBuildsLength-1))` do set +x #The child Build Url and the number of the build SonBuildsUrl=$(echo "$AllSonsBuildJsonFile" | jq '.runs['$i'].url') SonBuildsUrl=${SonBuildsUrl:1} SonBuildsUrl=${SonBuildsUrl%'"'}$apiAdress SonBuildsNumber=$(echo "$AllSonsBuildJsonFile" | jq '.runs['$i'].number') set -x if [ "$SonBuildsNumber" == "$FatherBuildNumber" ] then set +x SonBuildJsonFile=$(curl -s --insecure -u $User:$ApiToken $SonBuildsUrl) set -x #get The child Build name SonBuildUrlName=${SonBuildsUrl##*AUTOPRD=} SonBuildUrlName=${SonBuildUrlName%,*} #get this branch childs name (happen for each branch once) tempChild="child_${indexOfDynamicChilds}_$GerritBranchNoPoints" if [ -z "${!tempChild}" ] then declare child_${indexOfDynamicChilds}_$GerritBranchNoPoints=$SonBuildUrlName fi indexOfDynamicChilds=$((indexOfDynamicChilds+1))
#check if the Son build Failed or succuess set +x SonBuildFaledOrSuccess=$(echo "$SonBuildJsonFile" | jq '.result') set -x SonBuildFaledOrSuccess=${SonBuildFaledOrSuccess:1} SonBuildFaledOrSuccess=${SonBuildFaledOrSuccess%'"'} if [ "$SonBuildFaledOrSuccess" == "$FAILURE" ] then CountEnteredTheIf=$((CountEnteredTheIf+1)) #Check Which Build Failed and count how many times failed for i in `seq 0 $((${!tempLength}-1))` do #count how many times each child failed tempChild="child_${i}_$GerritBranchNoPoints" if [ "${!tempChild}" == "$SonBuildUrlName" ] then declare CountSonFailed_${i}_$GerritBranchNoPoints=$((CountSonFailed_${i}_$GerritBranchNoPoints+1)) fi done else for i in `seq 0 $((${!tempLength}-1))` do #count how many times each child was running in total tempChild="child_${i}_$GerritBranchNoPoints" if [ "${!tempChild}" == "$SonBuildUrlName" ] then declare CountChildSuccess_${i}_$GerritBranchNoPoints=$((CountChildSuccess_${i}_$GerritBranchNoPoints+1)) fi done fi fi done if [[ "$CountEnteredTheIf" == "${!tempLength}" ]] then #count how many times all the childs was Failed declare AllFailed_$GerritBranchNoPoints=$((AllFailed_$GerritBranchNoPoints+1)) fi fi fi done set -x #print to text file all the data about each branch about his parents and childs TodayDate=$(date +"%Y%m%d") echo "Date: $TodayDate" >> $JobName.txt echo -e "
" >> $JobName.txt echo "FirstBuild: $FirstBuildNumber" >> $JobName.txt echo -e "
" >> $JobName.txt echo "LastBuild: $LastBuildNumber" >> $JobName.txt echo -e "
" >> $JobName.txt for i in `seq 0 $(($arrBranchesIndex-1))` do AllBuildsHappend="AllBuilds_${branchesArr[$i]}" FatherBuildsFailed="AllFatherBuildsFaled_${branchesArr[$i]}" tempChild="child_0_${branchesArr[$i]}" tempCount="CountSonFailed_0_${branchesArr[$i]}" tempAllFailed="AllFailed_${branchesArr[$i]}" tempAllSuccess="AllSuccess_${branchesArr[$i]}" echo "Branch: ${branchesArr[$i]}" >> $JobName.txt echo -e "
" >> $JobName.txt echo "allBuilds_${branchesArr[$i]}: ${!AllBuildsHappend}" >> $JobName.txt echo -e "
" >> $JobName.txt echo "allSucceeded_${branchesArr[$i]}: ${!tempAllSuccess}" >> $JobName.txt echo -e "
" >> $JobName.txt echo "allFatherBuildsFailed_${branchesArr[$i]}: ${!FatherBuildsFailed}" >> $JobName.txt echo -e "
" >> $JobName.txt if [ -z ${!tempChild} ] then echo "notFailed" >> $JobName.txt echo -e "
" >> $JobName.txt else echo "allSonsFailed_${branchesArr[$i]}: ${!tempAllFailed}" >> $JobName.txt echo -e "
" >> $JobName.txt for j in `seq 0 $((${lengthBranchesArr[$i]}-1))` do tempChild="child_${j}_${branchesArr[$i]}" tempCount="CountSonFailed_${j}_${branchesArr[$i]}" tempChildSuccessfulCount="CountChildSuccess_${j}_${branchesArr[$i]}" declare CountChildSuccess_${j}_${branchesArr[$i]}=$((CountChildSuccess_${j}_${branchesArr[$i]}+CountSonFailed_${j}_${branchesArr[$i]})) echo "${!tempChild}_${branchesArr[$i]} Failed: ${!tempCount} Times" >> $JobName.txt echo -e "
" >> $JobName.txt echo "${!tempChild}_${branchesArr[$i]} Total: ${!tempChildSuccessfulCount} Times" >> $JobName.txt echo -e "
" >> $JobName.txt done fi done done
